title: Unfortunately I have a Pixel 2 XL phone and it SUCKS. They always say it's because of a appðŸ˜‚
content: Why does my Pixel 2 XL suck!!! It was $1000.00, paying $100.00 a month for it and it is virtually useless. No internet connection, not loading pictures, speaker not working, dropping calls, lagging, web pages not loading. Nothing is loading. Camera has a blinding brightness when trying to take pictures, offline, etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc
